title-group.article-title: Analysis of Locally Stabilized Mixed Finite Element Methods for the Stokes Problem

abstract.p: In this paper, a locally stabilized finite element formulation of the Stokes problem is analyzed. A macroelement condition which is sufficient for the stability of (locally stabilized) mixed methods based on a piecewise constant pressure approximation is introduced. By satisfying this condition, the stability of the Q<sub>1</sub> - P<sub>0</sub> quadrilateral, and the P<sub>1</sub> - P<sub>0</sub> triangular element, can be established.
